author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

Similar to 2026 scenarios, 2021 scenario is autogenerated by a script. 

```
python ./Configuration/Geometry/scripts/generate2021Geometry.py
```

@fabiocos , could you, please, check if eras and modifies are correctly defined

- [x] produce a dd4hep 2021 scenario from the same script

- [x] add PPS in the CTPPS section

- [x] add automated validation to check if the 2021 scenario was modified by hand

title: Generate 2021 Scenario Automatically
